intro: Hieracium murorum subsp. praevarianum, commonly known as the Prævarian hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and yellowish to brownish composite flowers. The plant typically grows in grassy areas and open habitats, preferring well-drained soils. Its leaves are usually lance-shaped and covered with fine hairs. This subspecies is native to Europe and is often found in temperate regions.
